I participate of competitions openAI hosts around generating creative writing since my texts wouldn't really pass as human written and I wouldn't fool anyone in thr turing test."

I cannot adequately handle compound or embedded sentences nor diverse aspects of ambiguous and multiple constituents making up expressive sentences requiring deeper linguistic knowledge.
